div.p: JEFFERSON, LA â Starting Wednesday, April 15th, 2020, at 11:00 a.m., there will be a road closure of the southbound/right hand lane of David Dr. at York St. in Metairie.
JEFFERSON, LA â Starting Tuesday, March 24th, 2020, at 8:30 a.m., there will be a complete road closure in both directions of Sauve Rd. at Idlewood Pl. and Sauve Rd. at Joel Ave. in River Ridge.

h4.a: LANE CLOSURE - LAPALCO BOULEVARD AT PROMENADE TO 4908 LAPALCO BOULEVARD

div.p: JEFFERSON, LA â Starting today at 9:00 a.m., one lane westbound on Lapalco Blvd. at Promenade Blvd. to 4908 Lapalco Blvd. will be closed.
JEFFERSON, LA â Starting today, there will be a complete closure of W. Napoleon Ave. between Metairie Heights Ave. and Galleria Blvd.
JEFFERSON, LA - Starting on Tuesday, March 17, 2020, the northbound lane of Central Ave. between Karen Ave. and Airline Hwy. will be closed.
JEFFERSON, LA - Starting on March 16, 2020, Causeway Blvd. (center median), between 21st St. and 5th St. will be closed.

h4.a: LANE CLOSURE: LABARRE ROAD AT AIRLINE DRIVE

div.p: JEFFERSON, LA â Starting on Thursday, March 5, 2020, at 9:00 a.m., the southbound right turn lane on Labarre Rd. in Metairie will be closed.

h4.a: LANE CLOSURE: LAPALCO BOULEVARD BRIDGE AT BAYOU SEGNETTE

div.p: Starting on Wednesday, February 19, 2020, all east and westbound lanes on Lapalco Blvd. bridge at Bayou Segnette will be closed starting at 9:00 a.m.
Starting tomorrow, Tuesday February 11, 2020, one southbound lane of David Drive near Trenton Street in Metairie will close between the hours of 9:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m.
JEFFERSON, LA - Starting on Monday, February 10, 2020, at 8:00 a.m., the right lane of Earhart Expressway (eastbound) Causeway Blvd. to Central Ave. will be closed.
